item.title: 系统调度
item.description: 系统调度 调度核心函数实现 1/* 2* kernel/sched/core.c 3* 4* Core kernel scheduler code and related syscalls 5* 6* Copyright (C) 1991-2002 Linus Torvalds 7*/ 8#include "sched.h"9 10#include <linux/nospec.h>11 12#include <linux/kcov.h>13 14#include <asm/switch_to.h>15#include <asm/tlb.h>16 17#include "../workqueue_internal.h"18#include "../smpboot.h"19 20#include "pelt.h"21 22#define CREATE_TRACE_POINTS 23#include <trace/events/sched.h>24 25DEFINE_PER_CPU_SHARED_ALIGNED(struct rq, runqueues); 26 27#ifdef CONFIG_SCHED_DEBUG 28/* 29* Debugging: various feature bits 30* 31* If SCHED_DEBUG is disabled, each compilation
